provsec_select_own.name: provsec_select_own
provsec_select_own.using:
exists (
          select 1 from "providers" p
          where p.id = "provider_secrets"."provider_id"
            and p.owner_id = (select auth.uid())
        )

provsec_insert_own.name: provsec_insert_own
provsec_insert_own.withCheck:
exists (
          select 1 from "providers" p
          where p.id = "provider_secrets"."provider_id"
            and p.owner_id = (select auth.uid())
        )
        and exists (
          select 1 from "secrets_meta" s
          where s.id = "provider_secrets"."secret_id"
            and s.owner_id = (select auth.uid())
        )

provsec_update_own.name: provsec_update_own
provsec_update_own.using:
exists (
          select 1 from "providers" p
          where p.id = "provider_secrets"."provider_id"
            and p.owner_id = (select auth.uid())
        )
provsec_update_own.withCheck:
exists (
          select 1 from "providers" p
          where p.id = "provider_secrets"."provider_id"
            and p.owner_id = (select auth.uid())
        )
        and exists (
          select 1 from "secrets_meta" s
          where s.id = "provider_secrets"."secret_id"
            and s.owner_id = (select auth.uid())
        )

provsec_delete_own.name: provsec_delete_own
provsec_delete_own.using:
exists (
          select 1 from "providers" p
          where p.id = "provider_secrets"."provider_id"
            and p.owner_id = (select auth.uid())
        )

smtpsec_select_own.name: smtpsec_select_own
smtpsec_select_own.using:
exists (select 1 from "smtp_accounts" a
                where a.id = "smtp_account_secrets"."account_id"
                  and a.owner_id = (select auth.uid()))

smtpsec_insert_own.name: smtpsec_insert_own
smtpsec_insert_own.withCheck:
exists (select 1 from "smtp_accounts" a
                where a.id = "smtp_account_secrets"."account_id"
                  and a.owner_id = (select auth.uid()))
        and exists (select 1 from "secrets_meta" s
                    where s.id = "smtp_account_secrets"."secret_id"
                      and s.owner_id = (select auth.uid()))

                  and a.owner_id = (select auth.uid()))
